properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters OF Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 10:31AM AST until January 11 at 7:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Strong easterly winds will cause rough seas...

.Hazardous seas and fresh to strong trade winds are expected
across the regional waters today and well into next week due to a
strong surface high pressure.

* WHAT...East winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 7
increasing to 9 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters OF Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 7 PM AST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft,
particularly on the western side of the zone.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM AST SATURDAY
